dashboard.title: The APPKU That Delivers Real Results
dashboard.text: Discover the power of Tradiry, the ultimate online APPKU meticulously designed to revolutionize your trading experience. Developed by seasoned professionals with a wealth of expertise, Tradiry empowers you to effortlessly track, analyze, and gain valuable insights from your trades.

appku.title: APPKU Features
appku.text1: Effortlessly Manage Multiple Trading Accounts with Advanced Portfolio Management Tools.
appku.text2: Our trading system manager will help you to perfect your trading strategy.
appku.text3: A detailed report will help you to identify your mistakes and show the way to avoid losses.
appku.text4: Tradiry empowers you to take your trading to the next level by allowing you to create your own customized filters.
appku.text5: Unlock Your Trading Potential: Leverage Dynamic Filters to Optimize Every Aspect of Your Trading Journey.
appku.text6: Tradiry is developing in partnership with the community. We are always open to new ideas.

traders.title: Over 10,000 traders use the APPKU
traders.text: Take your trading to the next level with Tradiry, the all-inclusive platform designed to meet all your trading requirements. Whether you're an experienced trader or a novice, our free trading journal provides you with the essential tools to enhance your trading performance and attain exceptional outcomes. Improve your trading skills with the best online trading journal.

similarSectionMonitor.title: Monitor multiple metrics on multiple accounts
similarSectionMonitor.text: More than 30 trading metrics to understand your trading habits. Our system will detect:
similarSectionMonitor.label1: What statistically works, so you can make data driven decisions and trade with confidence.
similarSectionMonitor.label2: What statistically works, so you can make data driven decisions and trade with confidence.
similarSectionMonitor.label3: What market conditions you perform better.
similarSectionMonitor.label4: Daily trading habits that can ruin your trading career.

similarSectionView.title: View your past performance anytime
similarSectionView.text: The ultimate trade tracker. Track your trades by:
similarSectionView.label2: Instruments (e.g. all trades on AAPL, ESZ16, EURUSD).
similarSectionView.label3: What market conditions you perform better.

similarSectionTrading.title: Your trading performance through beautiful reports
similarSectionTrading.label1: Tracking equity growth by date, time, instruments and more.
similarSectionTrading.label3: Longs, shorts, wins, losses, you name it, we track them.
similarSectionTrading.label4: Best times to trade, best market conditions, best instruments, best strategies.

similarSectionJournal.title: Trading journal features for the most diligent trader
similarSectionJournal.text: Beautiful layout and usability to monitor your progress including:
similarSectionJournal.label1: Individual trade and daily journal entries.
similarSectionJournal.label2: Image attachments and full WYSIWYG HTML editor.
similarSectionJournal.label3: Image bank with all your uploaded images.
similarSectionJournal.label4: Auto fills your entries with trading statistics.

software.title: The ultimate APPKU software built to optimize your trading success.
software.text: Tradiry trading journal available for any markets, and works with trading accounts in all currencies.

frequently.text1: As in any business, it’s important to keep track and to monitor the performance  indicators in trading. A good trading journal will help you to learn from your mistakes instead  of stepping on the same rake.
frequently.label2: Why is it so important to use a trading journal?
frequently.text2: As in any business, it’s important to keep track and to monitor the performance  indicators in trading. A good trading journal will help you to learn from your mistakes instead  of stepping on the same rake.
frequently.text3: As in any business, it’s important to keep track and to monitor the performance  indicators in trading. A good trading journal will help you to learn from your mistakes instead  of stepping on the same rake.
frequently.text4: As in any business, it’s important to keep track and to monitor the performance  indicators in trading. A good trading journal will help you to learn from your mistakes instead  of stepping on the same rake.

getItTouch.text: Thank you for being part of the Tradiry trading journal community. Together, we can create a powerful tool that empowers traders to achieve their goals and excel in the dynamic world of trading.
